hero.title: Join Us in the Fight Against Hunger
hero.subTitle: Welcome to DishDash, where a passion for good food meets a commitment to making the world a better place. We are a platform dedicated to transforming surplus restaurant food into opportunities to feed those who need it most!

1.title: Sign up as a food donor
1.description: If you have excess food that you want to donate, you can sign up on our website as a food donor. You will need to provide some basic information, such as your name, email and phone number.
1.imgAlt: User registering into app using laptop

2.title: Create a food listing
2.description: Once you are logged in, you can create a new food listing on our website. You will need to provide some information about the food you want to donate and specify the location and timeframe for the food to be picked up by the food receiver.
2.imgAlt: Food image on a website opened in laptop and mobile

3.title: Receive a notification
3.description: When a food receiver reserves your food, you will receive a notification. You can view the details of the reservation, such as the name and contact of the food recipient and the pick-up time.
3.imgAlt: Woman receiving a notification on mobile, while holding a cup

4.title: Scan the QR code
4.description: When the food recipient arrives to pick up the food, scan the QR code they were given. The QR code will contain information about the food items that are to be dispensed.
4.imgAlt: Donor, scaning a qr code on mobile, while meeting a receiver

1.title: Sign up as a food recipient
1.imgAlt: User identifying as a charity worker
1.description: If you need food, you can sign up on our website as a food recipient. You will need to provide some basic information, such as your name, email, phone number, and address. You will also need to verify your identity and eligibility by uploading a proof of income, hardship or charity employment.

2.title: Browse food listings
2.imgAlt: Receiver browsing the available food listings on a laptop
2.description: Once you are logged in, you can browse the available food listings on our website. You can filter the food listings by category, distance, and availability to find the food that suits your needs and preferences. When you find a food listing that you want, you can reserve it for pick up by clicking the reserve button.

3.title: Receive a QR code
3.imgAlt: Receiver receiving a confirmation with the QR code on their phone
3.description: You will receive a confirmation email with the details of the food donor, the pick-up location, and the pick-up time. You will also receive a QR code that you will need to show to the food donor when you arrive to pick up the food.

4.title: Pick up the food
4.imgAlt: Receiver presenting themselves with a QR code, picking up the food
4.description: Follow the instructions specified by the food donor. After presenting yourself with your QR code, you will be able to pick up the food from the donor.

story.title: Our story
story.text: From a university project, the idea of creating positive change by connecting donors with those in need was born. We are a group of students passionate about fighting food waste and feeding those in need. The story of DishDash is the story of how a simple idea became a mission that brings the community together to make the world a better place.
story.imgAlt: Photo of Faculty of mathematics physics and informatics Comenius University in Bratislava

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: At DishDash, we are dedicated to reducing food waste and fighting hunger at the same time. Our mission is to build bridges between donors and receivers, who share the same vision of a world where everyone has access to nutritious food. We believe that every plate counts, and every food donation is a step towards a more sustainable and caring future.

goal.title: What we do
goal.text: We are an innovative platform that connects donor with surplus quality food with people in economic hardship. We facilitate food donation, ensuring that every unconsumed portion becomes an opportunity to feed someone in need.
goal.imgAlt: Man holding a cup which says: Do what you love

help.title: How you can help
help.text: We invite anyone and everyone to join us in our fight against hunger. With just a few clicks, you can make a donation to support those who need a helping hand. Every contribution counts and makes a difference. Help us spread the word. Share our platform on your social networks, tell your friends and family about us. The more people who join our cause, the more impact we can have.

getInTouch.title: Get in touch
getInTouch.subtitle: Have inquiries or concerns? Reach out to us without hesitation! We're here to assist you with any questions you may have.

register.title: Sign up
register.subTitle: Sign Up as a donor or receiver and join us now!

faq.noAnswerLink: Can't find it here? Check out our Help Center.

questions.title1: What is the purpose of this application?
questions.answer1: This app is designed to reduce food waste and hunger by connecting food donors with food recipients. Food donors are restaurants, groceries, stores, or individuals who have excess food that they want to donate instead of throwing away. Food recipients are charities, organizations, or individuals who need food and can pick it up from the donors.
questions.answer2: This app works as a food donation marketplace where food donors can post their available food items and food recipients can reserve them for pick up. Food donors can create a profile, add their location, upload photos and descriptions of their food items, and specify the pick up time and method. Food recipients can browse the food items in their area, filter them by category, distance, and availability, and reserve the ones they want.
questions.answer3: This app is open to anyone who wants to donate or receive food. However, food recipients need to sign up and verify their identity and eligibility before they can reserve food items. Food recipients can be charities, organizations, or individuals who are facing food insecurity or hardship. Food donors can be businesses or individuals who have surplus food that is still edible and safe to consume.
questions.title4: What types of food can be donated?
questions.answer4: You can donate any type of food that is still safe to eat and meets the food safety standards in your area. This includes cooked or uncooked food, packaged or unpackaged food, fresh or frozen food, and leftovers or surplus food. However, please note that the app does not accept food that has passed its expiration date, has been opened or partially consumed, or has signs of spoilage or contamination. You are responsible for ensuring that the food you donate is of good quality and condition.
questions.answer5: If you have excess food that you want to donate, you can sing up as a food donor on the website and create a food listing. When listing the food, you will need to provide a location and timeframe for the food to be picked up. Charities or individuals can then reserve these food items for pick up and will be given a QR code which they will have to present for scanning when picking up the food - this will confirm the completion of the donation.
questions.answer6: To reserve a food item, you have to sign up as a food recipient on the app and browse the available food listings in your area. You can filter the food listings by category, distance, and availability to find the food that suits your needs and preferences. When you find a food listing that you want, you can reserve it for pick up by clicking the reserve button. You will receive a QR code that you will need to show to the food donor when you arrive to pick up the food. This will confirm the receipt of the food.
questions.title7: What happens if I can’t pick up my reserved food?
questions.answer7: If you are unable to pick up your reserved food for any reason, please cancel your reservation as soon as possible through the app. This will free up the food for other food recipients who may need it
questions.title8: Is there a cost to use this application?
questions.answer8: No, there is no cost to use this application. It is completely free for both donors and recipients.
